post.body: I am so going to win the DVD player for your Facebook Fan Page photo upload contest: http://tinyurl.com/6665t3 Tee hee hee
I am pretty much in love with my hometown too. Make sure to check out the awesome produce at the Farmer's Market.
Hahah - that is hilarious - and awesome: http://socialtoo.com/survey/view/203 Where in the world is @techcrunch?
And what about the new Oasis album "Dig Out Your Soul"....."I'm all over my heart's desire, I feel cold but I'm back in the fire"
what do you think the chic stands for in geek chic? Holllaarrr.
@minjae no on #bacon! veggiedom FTW!
Hmm $1000 to JCPenney? I'd likely buy myself some sweet jewels or maybe refurnish my bedroom: http://www.jcp.com/givingsweeps
You really are an absurdity aficionada! And yes,"Police want help identifying owners of stolen underwear" is truly bizarre & gross!
I think you just found my newest favoritest internet thingy: http://political.addictionary.org/
Thanks. It's from a beautiful statue in a park in Mendoza, Argentina that I took while traveling.
I hope I can satisfy your request to follow DC's "twitterati" - I can't say I'm always interesting, but certainly not dull :)
CK could get votes based on name recognition & being someone "different" - but you're right, she is not as experienced.
Red velvet cake tastes sweet, with hints of almond & creamy cake goodness. Add some buttercream frosting and ooh la la la.
@jillmz NY Senate options w/ Clinton as SOS.
Caroline Kennedy would be a great pick and well-suited to target voters, however, I'm not sure how likely it is that she'll do it.
It's almost five o'clock. Time to celebrate!
Nope - haven't seen the OpenTable app. Do they have it for Blackberry too?
Have you seen the new Weather Network iPhone app? It's free, which is nice - http://www.ireviewiphoneapps.com/?p=420
His opinion is so 2007 - http://tinyurl.com/5neaw3 - I questioned my generation too, but we've grown up & overcome our apathy.
Haha - you're so brave in your travels! A regular Che Guevara over there....:)
Tis the season for....being jolly? Bells & Holly? Hmmm.
@womanistmusings Ugh that is annoying. Oprah is awesome - and yet the media only works to tear her down.
Mmm sounds delish. And I am hungry which makes it even worse.
no - they didn't want a speech - they wanted a dance....
talk about a meeting of minds. Sound like fun - good luck!
And what place is colder than your classroom? Curious.
It used to be Viridian on 14th/P, but then it closed for good reason. Posto is taking it's place - I wonder how it will be.

My Gmail has been freezing just like me. I blame the winter.
@veronicaeye thanks for retweeting Ideas for Change. I would love to see at least one women's rights issue in the top ten!
And people wonder why I left print journalism...sigh.
Ok. Time to leave the office. Phew.

Someone spammed my World Aids Day blog post with a link to "charming lingerie." Good Lord, who are these people.
Just sprinted two blocks after the bus in heels & didn't catch it. People on the street must think I am nuts. Alas.

Quote of the day: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." - Virginia Woolf
Decided to pull out the holiday decorations this morning. It's time to get into the spirit.

Just woke up from a four hour nap. Very disoriented.
West Wing. Thai Food. Flurries!
